title: Indonesia to set up crypto stock exchange
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
The Indonesian government is planning to establish its envisaged “crypto stock exchange” by the end of 2022, DealStreetAsia cited the country’s deputy trade minister Jerry Sambuaga as saying. Originally set to launch in 2021, the realisation of the bourse was

The post Indonesia to set up crypto stock exchange appeared first on Investvine.
